Sentencas: A rapid and reliable numerical model to predict solid oxide cell (SOC) stack behaviors is essential for technology advancement.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: This work reports the development of an accurate and efficient multiphysics model for production-scale SOC stacks.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: An analytical model is constructed to consider the ohmic resistance of current conduction in thin electrodes, simplifying modeling process.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The model demonstrates good agreement with experimental I-V curves.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A detailed mesh optimization is performed for all components of SOC stacks to ensure grid independence in flow, electrochemistry, and thermal fields.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Moreover, a well-designed simulation strategy is presented, contributing equally to the computational efficiency as mesh optimization.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A multiphysics simulation of a 5 kW SOEC stack takes only 50 min on a 2-CPU/24-core workstation, demonstrating the applicability of the model.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The fuel uniformity of a H2O-SOEC (H2-SOFC) stack is found to increase (decrease) with increased fuel utilization, with underlying mechanism revealed through a representative 2D flow model.
Titulo: An accurate and efficient multiphysics 3D model for the design and operation analysis of production-scale solid oxide cell stacks
